name: context-manager
title: Context Manager
description: Manage team context distribution and initialization. Provides commands for teams to pull, initialize, and update context templates from the marketplace into their projects.
author: Pandora Team

commands.name: context:init
commands.description: Initialize team context in a project by copying selected context domains to .claude/context/

commands.name: context:list
commands.description: List available context domains in the marketplace

commands.name: context:pull
commands.description: Pull specific context domains from the marketplace
